name: text_overlays
rule: Non-diegetic on-screen text (captions, headers, labels, CTAs) must NOT be baked into Sora generations. Render clean scenes with Sora and add text using Remotion overlay layers in post.
examples: GOOD: Sora renders the object-only scene; Remotion adds a header overlay.
BAD: Sora prompt includes 'text on screen', causing baked-in text artifacts.
guidelines: Treat captions, lower-thirds, headers, and calls-to-action as overlays.
Only bake text if it is physically present in-scene (diegetic signage).
Extract overlay copy and timing as structured metadata for Editor to place in Remotion.
